column4: No one can help me? :( I tried asking in #linux as well. I've done apt-get update and upgrades already, nothing works that I can find.
Simply looking to install xfce on 12.04 server. But I get "E: Unable to locate package xfce4:
Forbidden404: That first command results in sudo: add-apt-repository: command not found.
what Ubuntu version are you using?
